{"blocks":[{"key":"1c0gr","text":"Use   with our modified protocol to perform cDNA quantification as followed:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5puf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kltm","text":"1. Prepare the Qubit‱   Working Solution: Dilute the Qubit dsDNA HS Reagent at a ratio of 1:200 in Qubit‱ dsDNA HS Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":26},{"style":"sup","offset":20,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":4},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":104,"length":2}],"data":{}},{"key":"fq14b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be4b7","text":"2. Prepare Standards: Create a series of standards at concentrations of 0, 1.25, 2.5, and 5 ng/µL by performing serial dilutions of Qubit‱ 1X dsDNA HS Standard #2, which has a concentration of 10 ng/µL. This will allow for accurate quantification during the assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":137,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a6h9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kmt2","text":"3. Dispense Working Solution: Using an Integra VIAFLO, dispense 34 µL of the prepared Qubit‱ working solution into each well of the black, flat-bottom 384-well plates (Corning, Catalog#3820)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":38,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":86,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fqm1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eghl","text":"4. Add Standards: In a separate plate, add 1 µL of each prepared standard to the corresponding wells. This will enable the creation of a standard curve for quantifying the cDNA concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au4ha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43geu","text":"5. Add cDNA Samples: Add 1 µL of cDNA sample to each well of the plate containing the Qubit‱ working","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"631h3","text":"solution. Ensure that samples are added to the correct wells to maintain accurate results.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceinp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d455","text":"6. Measure Fluorescence: Use a SpectraMax microplate reader to measure the fluorescence of the samples. Set the excitation wavelength to 485 nm and the emission wavelength to 525 nm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpvl8","text":"Record the fluorescence intensity for each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpunq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ugmt","text":"7. Calculate cDNA Concentration: Analyze the fluorescence data to calculate the cDNA concentration in the samples using the standard curve generated from the known standards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45jg6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b71s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41066F3F341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Qubit® dsDNA HS Assay Kit","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"Q32854","stats":{"total_protocols":29},"url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/Q32854","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific"}}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A7997D7BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A799A37BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A798CF7BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"4":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A799017BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"5":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A7992E7BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"6":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D1A799537BB111EFA0560A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}
